attributes.action: dismiss Bob Ainsworth at the first opportunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the debate in the House of Commons on March 25th (opposition motion for an inquiry into the build up to the invasion of Iraq). Defence minister Bob Ainsworth said "Al Queda wont be having an enquiry so we shouldn't either". Comparing the UK Privy Council to a terrorist organisation which is completely unacceptable and the Prime Minister should sack him.
